codes.AMND: Status is related to an undertaking amendment.
codes.AMTC: Status is related to a counter-undertaking amount.
codes.AMTU: Status is related to an undertaking amount.
codes.APPL: Status is related to an undertaking application.
codes.BAMD: Status is related to an undertaking amendment requested by the beneficiary.
codes.CONF: Status is related to an undertaking confirmation.
codes.DEMD: Status is related to an undertaking demand.
codes.NEXT: Status is related to an undertaking non-extension request.
codes.TERM: Status is related to an undertaking termination.

description: Specifies the external status stage code in the format of a character string with a maximum length of 4 characters. The list of valid codes is an external code list published separately.
name: ExternalUndertakingStatusCategory1Code
